rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment factually reports a past case. No high-potency verbs or potent metaphors used.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports historical case without explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation without an explicit calming cue.
Reports a past case, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a case and its significance, not prices or economic metrics.
The segment reports a past case, not future relief.
No direct quote or attributed statement present.
Factual report of a case and significance presented neutrally.
